name: Sanaki
insights: Sanaki is the only hero with Nifl Frostflowers.
Sanaki is the only hero with Def/Res Link 3.
Sanaki is the only hero with Def/Res Link 2.
Sanaki is the only hero with Def/Res Link 1.
Sanaki has the lowest <abbr title="Defense">DEF</abbr> potential possible among Green heroes.
description: Empress of Begnion. Known as the Apostle, voice of the goddess. Curiosity led her to participate in a festival about brides. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

dialogue.text: You stand in the presence of Sanaki, 37th Empress of Begnion. I am the Apos— M-my dress? It is nothing you should concern yourself with. Do not interrupt me!
Of course I'm not getting married. This is merely a costume for a bridal festival of sorts.
I hear that wedding ceremonies feature all manner of fancy banquets, but the bride has no time to eat. Isn't that just tragic? She is the star of the wedding, after all.
Sigrun and Tanith of the Holy Guard are my personal guards. What would they say if they saw me wearing this?
It would cause quite the episode were I to step on my dress's hem and trip, so I will allow you to escort me. Lend me your arm. With your support, I will not fall.
I heard that in a wedding ceremony, the couple pledges their eternal love with a kiss. And a kiss is... It's...
You may kneel, if you wish—you are standing in the presence of... Hm, no... I should deliver the greeting from <Friend Name> first.
Is this because of that rumored power of love?
Even dressed like this, I continue to exceed expectations.
I can't demonstrate my full power in this silly dress!
I've grown? How much, exactly? Do I need a new dress?

I am the 37th Empress of Begnion. It is for this purpose I was born and to this end I was raised. I am different from the common person... So my wedding, too, will be different from the common person's. My groom will not be chosen based upon feelings alone. However, I think my desire to be with someone I love... Is the same as any other person's... Spending this time with you has allowed me to realize this. And someday, when I, too... H-hey, you better not tell anyone I'm telling you all this! This is our secret, got it?! *ahem* Understood?
